FuncDef: The display value-added-service policy command displays the summary of all value-added service policies or information about a specified value-added service policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the service policy name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Index   Service Policy Name               Used Num  Type  User Num
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After value-added service policies are configured, you can run the display value-added-service policy command to view the configured service policies. If no service policy is specified, this command displays the summary of all service policies. If a service policy is specified, this command displays information about this specified service policy.
If DAA and EDSG service policies have the same name and the name is specified, running the display value-added-service policy <policy-name> command displays detailed information about only the DAA service policy. If BOD and EDSG service policies have the same name and the name is specified, running the display value-added-service policy <policy-name> command displays detailed information about only the BOD service policy.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
